title: The Mickey Rourke Recipe
full_text:
The Mickey Rourke Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
silver tequila
2
dashes
Angostura bitters
2 1/2
ounces
fresh blood orange juice
1/4
ounce
freshly squeezed lime juice
Ice
Directions
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and stir well. Strain into ice-filled highball glass.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass and
cocktail strainer
Tequila
